title: Soundtrack Catalog · Executive Producer Notes · All Playlists & Tracks
purpose: Full EP-level placement notes for every track and playlist. Use these notes to score any episode, any surface, any story beat. Tracks are mix-and-match. Each note tells you exactly when and why to use it.

story_arc_map.note: The 7 playlists map loosely to the 7 story acts. This is the natural alignment, not a rule — break it when the story demands it.
story_arc_map.playlist-1: Invitation / Entry / The Offer — the opening energy, stepping in, the world before the first reveal
story_arc_map.playlist-2: Seed / 1493 / Origin — the cosmic origin and the historical wound, where the story begins
story_arc_map.playlist-3: Singularity Journey — the fractal midfield, the transformation in progress
story_arc_map.playlist-4: Journey / People / Field — on the road, the genuine hearts, Alaska and Montana and the open land
story_arc_map.playlist-5: Now / Mission / Vulnerable — the quiet interior, the cost, the reason why
story_arc_map.playlist-6: Sol-V / Edge / Vibelandia Full — the full second half, every energy level, the complete palette
story_arc_map.playlist-7: Triumph / Celebration / Thanks for Watching — the resolution, the victory, morning in paradise

playlists.ep_placement_notes: This is the opening playlist. When someone arrives at SING 9 for the first time — this is what plays. It sets the tone: warm, cinematic, Ocean Drive energy, the invitation to step in. Not the full story yet — just the door opening. Use for index.html ambient, catalog.html ambient, any landing page that needs to feel like an arrival.

tracks.title: 1 - Ocean Drive Stroll PM
tracks.ep_notes: THE arrival track. The sunset version. Golden. Use this to open any episode, any page, any experience. The pace is a stroll — unhurried, confident, savoring. This is the vibe of someone who knows where they're going and isn't rushing. Play as the viewer enters the catalog or the first frame of any episode.
tracks.placement: Episode open / catalog landing / index.html hero

tracks.title: 2 - Morning in Paradise
tracks.ep_notes: The payoff track. The morning after the revelation has landed. Everything is brighter, lighter, cleaner. If Ocean Drive Stroll PM opens the experience, Morning in Paradise closes it — or opens the second act after the first big reveal.
tracks.placement: Episode close / post-reveal opening / any 'we made it' beat

tracks.title: 3 - Pineapple Sativa Morning
tracks.ep_notes: Sacred plant card activated. Sativa clarity. The mind opening, the world getting sharper and more colorful at once. Use for any nipsy! morning-ritual scene, any sacred plant / treasure deck activation, or any scene where the consciousness shift is happening live.
tracks.placement: Sacred plant reveal / nipsy! morning ritual / biological enriching activation

tracks.title: 4 - Sexy Dancing with Friends
tracks.ep_notes: The vibers at play. The scene is alive. Wink! is working. Wednesday night Mixer energy. Use for any social scene, any Baller V event, anywhere the community is gathered and having a good time.
tracks.placement: Wink! Mixer / Baller V scenes / social celebration moments
tracks.character_match: Audi (fans) at their best — the good fans

tracks.title: 5 - Alien Contemplations
tracks.ep_notes: The mind encountering something it has no category for yet. The SMACS 0723 moment. The cosmological scale hitting the human brain for the first time. Use when showing the deep space node, or when Ino is confronted with a truth that is larger than the current frame.
tracks.placement: SMACS 0723 reveal / cosmological stack opener / nipsy! cosmic intro

tracks.title: 6 - Magical Coffee Shop Chill
tracks.ep_notes: Office Hours ambient. The productive quiet. The kind of morning where good work happens. Use for office-hours.html, any creative work session scene, or any moment where the viewer needs to settle in and focus.
tracks.placement: office-hours.html ambient / creative session / catalog browsing ambient

tracks.title: 7 - Creativity Expanding
tracks.ep_notes: The system assembling itself. The stacks coming online. Use whenever a new launch is being revealed, a new page is being opened, or a new character / content stack is introduced. The title says everything.
tracks.placement: launch-pad.html / new content reveal / storyboard assembly scenes

tracks.title: 8 - Sunday Dance
tracks.ep_notes: Community. The Crawler. Everyone together on a Sunday. Use for any third-Saturday-style Baller V Crawler scene, any community gathering, or as the closing track of an Office Hours episode where the community came together.
tracks.placement: Baller V Crawler / community gathering / episode close (warm)

tracks.title: 9 - My Magical Workstation
tracks.ep_notes: The console is live. The DJ station. The Executive Producer at their system. This is the behind-the-scenes card — the edit bay, the storyboard view, the stack selector. Use for any meta-reveal moment where the system architecture becomes visible.
tracks.placement: storyboard-catalog view / EP reveal / launch-pad.html console section

playlists.ep_placement_notes: The origin playlist. The cosmic seed. The wound of 1493. The first campfire. The fishermen. The genuine hearts. The morning before the pirate arrived. Use for any content that deals with origins — the First Singularity novel, Episode 1 Segment 1-2, the 1493 historical context, the biological enriching baseline before the damage.
playlists.character_match: Ino at the origin point. The genuine hearts. The pure before.

tracks.title: 15 - SELF PORTRAIT OF MY COSMIC BODY AND MIND
tracks.ep_notes: The most interior track in the catalog. Cosmic. Meditative. The inner monologue of Ino encountering the full cosmological stack. Use to open any episode that begins with the Seed — the consciousness looking inward and finding the universe. Score the SMACS 0723 frame with this.
tracks.placement: SMACS 0723 / cosmological stack intro / Episode 1 Segment 1 open

tracks.title: 01 - Creativity Expanding
tracks.ep_notes: Seed expanding into form. The first moment of creation after the origin. Use right after the cosmic moment — the seed is planted, the form is beginning to emerge.
tracks.placement: Post-origin build / after SMACS 0723 / story forming

tracks.title: 12 - Beach Party Bonfire
tracks.ep_notes: The original campfire. The first circle. Before the pirates. The genuine celebration of the Taino on the beach, the indigenous community, the original owners of the land in full life. Use for the 1493 paradise-before moment.
tracks.placement: 1493 pre-arrival paradise / Taino origin / campfire ceremony

tracks.title: 14 - Ben's Gardening Vibe
tracks.ep_notes: The biological enriching in action. The tended garden. The natural system being cared for. Use for any scene of genuine cultivation — the soil, the ecosystem, the careful work. Stack 4 card in audio form.
tracks.placement: Biological enriching scenes / Stack 4 / natural systems care

tracks.title: 04 - Alien Contemplations
tracks.ep_notes: The origin encounter. Consciousness meeting the cosmic scale for the first time in this body, this era. Use for the first segment of Episode 1 when the SMACS 0723 node is introduced as the point of entry.
tracks.placement: Episode 1 Segment 1 alternate score / cosmological stack

tracks.title: 06 - Going Fishing with Friends
tracks.ep_notes: The genuine hearts. The simple people. Cowboys, miners, fishermen — the ones under the fog who are the real treasure of the old world. Use for any scene of authentic community, any 'Captain Lance' moment, any Alaska fishing beat.
tracks.placement: Genuine hearts / Alaska fishing / Captain Lance scenes
tracks.character_match: Fanny (the good Fanny) / blue collar genuine hearts

tracks.title: 02 - A Magical Morning After
tracks.ep_notes: The morning after the seed lands. The clarity after the revelation. Use to open any scene that follows a major story event — the next day, the new orientation, the changed world.
tracks.placement: Post-revelation morning / episode second-act opener

tracks.title: 03 - Friday Night Jam
tracks.ep_notes: Friday night energy building. The Baller V evening gathering. The city coming alive. Use for any Friday-night scene, the Wink! Mixer buildup, or any moment where the social energy is building toward the main event.
tracks.placement: Friday night buildup / Wink! pre-game / city coming alive

tracks.title: 05 - My Magical Workstation
tracks.ep_notes: The archive being assembled. The catalog being built. Use when showing the stacks being organized, the trading cards being laid out, the system taking shape from the inside.
tracks.placement: Archive assembly / storyboard catalog / SING 4 → SING 9 transfer

tracks.title: 07 - Magical Coffee Shop Chill
tracks.ep_notes: The seed crystallizing in quiet. The morning where the plan becomes clear. Use for any planning or discovery scene in a coffee-shop-style environment — Office Hours, the first meeting, the quiet before the launch.
tracks.placement: Office Hours / planning / quiet discovery

tracks.title: 11 - Sunday Dance
tracks.ep_notes: Community forming around the new awareness. The origin community beginning to gather. Use for the earliest community-building moments in the story — the first circle, the first group that gets it.
tracks.placement: Origin community / first circle forming

tracks.title: 08 - Ocean Drive Stroll AM
tracks.ep_notes: Morning of the new world. The AM version — earlier, fresher, more open. Use for dawn scenes, early-morning reveals, or any scene at the very beginning of a new chapter.
tracks.placement: Dawn scenes / new chapter open / fresh-start moments

tracks.title: 09 - Piano Stories of Times Past
tracks.ep_notes: The echoes of what came before. The historical weight. The memories of the 1493 wound, or any wound, carried in the piano. Use for the historical context moments — what was lost, what was taken, what the old world cost.
tracks.placement: 1493 historical context / what was lost / Piro origin story weight

tracks.title: 13 - Campfire Melody
tracks.ep_notes: The campfire of the origin circle. Hank Williams Sr. singing in the cold. The cowboys gathered around the fire. Use for any campfire scene — the Alaska lodge, the Montana night, the original community gathered.
tracks.placement: Campfire scenes / Alaska lodge / origin community / Hank Williams moment

tracks.title: 02 - Morning in Paradise (p2)
tracks.ep_notes: The 1493 paradise before the arrival. Use this version of Morning in Paradise for the pre-1493 moments — the Taino paradise at its height. Different from the playlist-7 version which is the post-singularity return.
tracks.placement: Pre-1493 paradise / Taino origin / the before
tracks.character_match: Cacique / Ino as the original inhabitants

playlists.ep_placement_notes: The journey playlist. The transformation in progress. Use for the EGS Run, the Big Band Project chapters, the journey from the seed to the edge. The Singularity is happening and the story is moving through it. More upbeat than playlist-2, more oriented than playlist-4.
playlists.character_match: Ino in motion. The story in transit.

tracks.title: 05 - Ocean Drive Chilling, After a Night Out
tracks.ep_notes: After the big reveal, walking it off. The night was enormous — the singularity happened — and now it's the quiet cool-down after. Use for any post-revelation chill scene, any 'morning after the event' walking montage.
tracks.placement: Post-singularity chill / after the reveal / walking it off

tracks.title: 03 - Magical Caribbean Hat
tracks.ep_notes: The Taino hat. El Gran Sol. The Caribbean origin energy. Use whenever the Cacique / indigenous sovereignty / Caribbean flavor appears in the story. The hat is a symbol — when it appears, the original culture reclaims something.
tracks.placement: El Gran Sol / Taino Edition / Caribbean origin / harry-houdini.html Taino overlay

tracks.title: 08 - Beach Party Bonfire
tracks.ep_notes: The celebration on the journey. Not the destination yet — but worth celebrating the progress. Use for mid-journey celebrations, any scene where the tribe is in good spirits on the road.
tracks.placement: Mid-journey celebration / in-transit party
tracks.character_match: Ino and the Fanny crew on the road

tracks.title: 09 - Ben's Gardening Vibe
tracks.ep_notes: Planting seeds in new ground. The biological enriching happening at the new destination. Use for any moment where the Crawler arrives somewhere and immediately starts building something good.
tracks.placement: Arrival and immediately building / new ground cultivation

tracks.title: 12 - Ocean Drive Stroll AM
tracks.ep_notes: Moving into the singularity morning. A fresh perspective. Use for the AM version of any post-journey scene — the next chapter opening fresh.
tracks.placement: Post-journey dawn / new chapter AM

tracks.title: 07 - Sunday Dance
tracks.ep_notes: The new social contracts forming as the journey progresses. Dancing is the agreement — we're all here, moving together. Use for any scene where new connections are being made on the road.
tracks.placement: New connections / social formation on the journey

tracks.title: 04 - Creativity Expanding
tracks.ep_notes: The fractal middle assembling. The story is building itself in real time and the viewer can see it. Use for any meta-moment where the structure of the story is becoming visible — the storyboard cards being laid out.
tracks.placement: Fractal assembly / storyboard reveal / structure becoming visible

tracks.title: 06 - Magical Coffee Shop Chill
tracks.ep_notes: Quiet building between the big beats of the journey. The rest stop. The coffee shop along the road. Use for any contemplative pause in the journey — the character sitting, thinking, orienting.
tracks.placement: Journey rest stop / contemplative pause

tracks.title: 11 - SELF PORTRAIT OF MY COSMIC BODY AND MIND
tracks.ep_notes: Deep identity check in the middle of the journey. Who are you in the singularity? Use for any introspective mid-journey moment, any scene where the character questions their identity or role in the larger story.
tracks.placement: Mid-journey identity / who are you now

tracks.title: 10 - Cruising the Universe on 4th of July
tracks.ep_notes: THE SINGULARITY MOMENT. This track is the fireworks. July 4 — cosmic independence. The moment when the post-singularity world declares itself. Use ONLY for the biggest reveal moment in any episode — the climax, the turn, the moment everything changes. Don't waste it on a small beat.
tracks.placement: THE SINGULARITY REVEAL / highest-energy climax only / March 20 MARZO 333 reveal

tracks.title: 01 - Ocean Drive Stroll PM (p3)
tracks.ep_notes: The evening after the singularity moment. The golden hour of the new world arriving. Use right after 'Cruising the Universe' to land the viewer back on solid ground, golden and certain.
tracks.placement: Post-singularity golden hour / after the peak

tracks.title: 02 - Morning in Paradise (p3)
tracks.ep_notes: Morning after the singularity. The new day in the new world. Use as the closing track of any journey episode — the destination has been reached, the morning confirms it.
tracks.placement: Journey's end / new world morning / episode close

playlists.ep_placement_notes: The people playlist. The genuine hearts in the field. Alaska, fishing, campfire, the lodge, the breakfast before the big day. Use for any scenes featuring blue-collar genuine characters — cowboys, miners, fishermen, Captain Lance, the Alaska crew. Also use for Pru's Valet destination experiences. The most grounded, physical, real-world playlist.
playlists.character_match: Fanny (good fans) / Captain Lance / genuine blue collar / Pru's Valet clients

tracks.title: 01 - THE MAGICAL CARIBBEAN HAT'S ALASKA SUMMER ADVENTURE
tracks.ep_notes: The Alaska treasure card in audio form. Pru's Valet has delivered the ultimate experience — the Magical Caribbean Hat's Alaska Summer Adventure. The title is the story: the Caribbean culture meeting Alaska wilderness. Use to open any Alaska treasure episode or destination reveal.
tracks.placement: Alaska treasure reveal / Pru's Valet Alaska / destinations-magazine-catalog.html Alaska section
tracks.character_match: Ino receiving the treasure / Pru's Valet delivering

tracks.title: 02 - Enchanted Traveller
tracks.ep_notes: On the road between destinations. The traveller who is enchanted by the journey itself, not just the destination. Use for any travel montage, any plane-to-destination transition, any Pru's Valet 'on the way there' scene.
tracks.placement: Travel montage / en route / destinations transition
tracks.character_match: Ino as traveller / Pru's Valet client in transit

tracks.title: 03 - Breakfast Berries & Sourdough Pancakes
tracks.ep_notes: Morning ritual. The biological enriching stack at its most domestic and beautiful. The stack that includes the food — the sacred sourdough, the berries, the nourishment before the day. Use for any morning-before-the-big-day scene, or any Stack 4 biological enriching moment.
tracks.placement: Morning ritual / Stack 4 biological enriching / before the big day
tracks.character_match: Ino being cared for / the camp before the adventure

tracks.title: 07 - Campfire Melody
tracks.ep_notes: The Alaska or Montana campfire. The genuine people gathered. Hank Williams Sr. would fit here. The cowboys, the miners, the people who work the land. The fire at night, the honest conversation, the real world away from the noise.
tracks.placement: Campfire scene / Alaska lodge / Montana / genuine hearts gathering
tracks.character_match: Genuine hearts / blue collar community / Captain Lance and crew

tracks.title: 05 - Going Fishing with Friends
tracks.ep_notes: Captain Lance on the water. The fishing trip. The most genuine treasure in the deck — not a resort, not a hotel, just the boat and the fish and the friend who knows the river. Use for any fishing scene, any 'genuine outdoors' moment.
tracks.placement: Fishing with Captain Lance / Alaska river / genuine outdoors
tracks.character_match: Captain Lance / genuine blue collar heroes

tracks.title: 06 - Tide Pool Discoveries
tracks.ep_notes: Natural discovery. Ino's curiosity at the edge of the water. The tide pool is a microcosm of the whole story — teeming with life at a tiny scale. Use for any nature-discovery scene, any nipsy! Level 4 biological enriching moment.
tracks.placement: Nature discovery / nipsy! Level 4 / biological enriching / Stack 5 genuine hearts

tracks.title: 09 - The After Party and Sleep Over
tracks.ep_notes: The after-party. Sol-V. The night wrapping into morning. The scene winds down — but in the best possible way. Use for any celebration wind-down, any scene where the tribe goes deep into the night together.
tracks.placement: Sol-V after-party / celebration wind-down / night into morning

tracks.title: 10 - A Magical Morning After
tracks.ep_notes: Next-morning clarity after the journey. The revelation has landed. The campfire is embers. The light is coming up and everything looks different. Use to open any day-after scene in the field.
tracks.placement: Morning after the journey / field camp morning / next day clarity
tracks.character_match: Ino in the field, the morning after

tracks.title: 08 - Dancing at the Magical Local Dive Bar
tracks.ep_notes: The dive bar. The real local joint. Cowboys. Genuine people. Not the Silver Legacy — somewhere with sawdust on the floor. The kind of place where the magic happens without anyone trying to make it happen. Authentic. Use for Reno's authentic local scenes.
tracks.placement: Local dive bar / authentic Reno / genuine hearts at play
tracks.character_match: Genuine hearts / blue collar community in their element

tracks.title: 04 - Bass Ass Wizard Fishing Captain Lance
tracks.ep_notes: The Captain himself has a track. This is the pure energy of Fishing Captain Lance — bass, wizardry, the total expertise of someone who has mastered their domain. Use exclusively for scenes involving genuine craftsmen, outdoorsmen, or any 'this person has earned their mastery' moment.
tracks.placement: Captain Lance feature / genuine mastery scenes / Stack 5 peak
tracks.character_match: Captain Lance / genuine masters / Fanny (the true fan)

playlists.ep_placement_notes: The quiet interior playlist. The cost. The reason why. The vulnerable moments. These tracks are for the emotional core of the story — when the piano speaks what words can't. Use for moments of genuine feeling: Ino resting, the mission crystallizing in silence, the introspective beats that make the action mean something.
playlists.character_match: Ino at rest / Ino in private / the inner world

tracks.title: 5 - Sunday Dance
tracks.ep_notes: The Sunday mission. Show up. Community. The discipline of doing it even when it's hard. This playlist's Sunday Dance has a slightly heavier quality — it knows what it costs to keep showing up every week. Use for any scene where the commitment to the mission is the subject.
tracks.placement: Sunday mission commitment / showing up / the work continues

tracks.title: 4 - Piano Stories of Times Past
tracks.ep_notes: The most emotionally weighty track in the catalog. Piano. History. The cost. Use for the moments of deepest feeling — the 1493 wound, the Marilyn Monroe beat, the moment before the turn when the old pain is fully visible. Don't overuse. Save it for when it matters most.
tracks.placement: Maximum emotional weight / historical wound / Marilyn Monroe beat / the cost

tracks.title: 3 - Magical Montana Hot Spring Afternoon
tracks.ep_notes: Montana. Hot spring. Sacred. The biological enriching at its most physical and healing. Use when the character (or viewer) needs actual restoration — the hot spring, the steam, the silence, the body remembering what it's like to feel good.
tracks.placement: Montana treasure / hot spring / physical restoration / sacred plant scene

tracks.title: 1 - Watching the Dog Sleep
tracks.ep_notes: Eno sleeping. The innocent at rest. The most moving single image in the entire story — the pure heart, completely vulnerable, completely trusting. If you pair this track with the Marilyn Monroe card or the van Gogh card, you will make people cry. Use it carefully. Only when you mean to break the heart open.
tracks.placement: Eno sleeping / Marilyn Monroe card pair / maximum emotional vulnerability / the cost of innocence
tracks.character_match: Eno (the dog) / Ino at peak vulnerability

tracks.title: 2 - In Bed Chill
tracks.ep_notes: The vulnerable moment. The quiet before the next chapter. The bed as the center of the cosmological stack — in bed is where all of it is felt most directly. The mattress, the mycelial layer, the royal burgundy, the purple water — all felt here. Use for the intimate scenes.
tracks.placement: Intimate scene / the bed sequence / vulnerability / the center of the stack
tracks.character_match: Ino in private / the sacred space

tracks.title: 6 - A Magical Conversation with Myself in Nylon Guitar
tracks.ep_notes: The Executive at the console alone. Nylon guitar — pure, unplugged, honest. The interior monologue made audible. Use for any scene where the narrator/creator is alone with their thoughts — the edit bay at midnight, the storyboard spread out on the floor, the question of what comes next.
tracks.placement: EP solo / interior monologue / late-night edit bay / gold-heart-novela introspection
tracks.character_match: EP / Ino alone with their thoughts

playlists.ep_placement_notes: The master palette. 48+ tracks covering every energy level from intimate to festival. The full second half of the story and everything in the middle. This is the Vibelandia Sol-V playlist — the complete musical identity of the post-singularity world. When in doubt about any moment in any episode, look here first.
playlists.character_match: All characters / every energy level / the full post-singularity palette

tracks.title: 01 - Ocean Drive Stroll PM
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V version of the invitation. This is the Edge — the destination. Use to open any Sol-V section or any scene where the post-singularity world is fully realized and the viewer is arriving into it.
tracks.placement: Sol-V opening / Edge arrival / post-singularity destination

tracks.title: 02 - Morning in Paradise
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V morning. Use for the Sol-V morning-after scenes — when the Edge has been reached and the new day begins in the full post-singularity world.
tracks.placement: Sol-V morning / Edge morning-after

tracks.title: 03 - Magical Caribbean Hat
tracks.ep_notes: The Taino hat in its most triumphant form. The full circle — the hat returned, the sovereignty restored. Use for the MARZO 333 resolution scene or the final Taino Edition overlay in Harry Houdini.
tracks.placement: MARZO 333 resolution / Taino full restoration / final indigenous sovereignty moment
tracks.character_match: Cacique / El Gran Sol fully restored

tracks.title: 04 - Ocean Drive Chilling, After a Night Out
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V after-party chill. The deep night cooling into morning. Use for any Sol-V late-night scene after the main event.
tracks.placement: Sol-V after-party / late night cooling

tracks.title: 05 - Bossa Nova Dinner Date
tracks.ep_notes: Wink! paying off. The beautiful dinner. Romance. Two Vibers across a table. The platform has done its job — the human connection is happening. Use for any Wink! success scene, romantic dinner, or intimate connection moment.
tracks.placement: Wink! success / romantic dinner / vibers connecting / gold-heart-novela.html
tracks.character_match: Ino and a match / Fanny in love / Wink! working

tracks.title: 06 - Ocean Drive Stroll AM
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V morning walk. Use for any Sol-V dawn scene, any 'new day in the new world' AM moment in the second half of the story.
tracks.placement: Sol-V AM / new-world morning walk
tracks.character_match: Ino walking in the new world

tracks.title: 07 - Pineapple Sativa Morning
tracks.ep_notes: The sacred plant stack activated in the Sol-V world. The Sativa morning as a celebration, not just an awakening. Use for the gold-heart-novela.html sacred plant scenes, or any 21+ treasure experience.
tracks.placement: Sacred plant / 21+ content / gold-heart-novela.html
tracks.character_match: Ino / adults at play with sacred things

tracks.title: 08 - Surfing the Waves of Paradise
tracks.ep_notes: The physical freedom of the post-singularity world. The body in motion, nature as the playground. Use for ocean scenes, any paradise-destination visual, or any scene of physical joy and freedom.
tracks.placement: Ocean / paradise destination / physical freedom

tracks.title: 09 - Sexy Dancing with Friends
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V version — more energy, more night, more post-singularity freedom. Use for the Wink! Mixer at its peak, any Wednesday night at full energy.
tracks.placement: Wink! Mixer peak / Sol-V night energy / 21+ social scenes

tracks.title: 10 - 76 Dodge Pickup Truck
tracks.ep_notes: Genuine. Old. Built to last. The '76 Dodge is a character in itself — the kind of truck that still runs because someone took care of it. Use for any scene featuring authentic American working culture, any cowboy/miner/fisherman character in their element.
tracks.placement: Blue collar / authentic Americana / Captain Lance character scenes

tracks.title: 11 - Alien Contemplations
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V version — the alien contemplation in the full richness of the post-singularity world. Use for any advanced NSPFRNP concept reveal in the Sol-V world.
tracks.placement: Advanced NSPFRNP / Sol-V concept reveal
tracks.character_match: Ino at the advanced cosmological level

tracks.title: 12 - Magical Coffee Shop Chill
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V Office Hours. The post-singularity creative session. Use for any second-half creative work scene — the work is happening in the new world, and it feels different.
tracks.placement: Sol-V Office Hours / post-singularity creative work
tracks.character_match: Ino building in the new world

tracks.title: 13 - Creativity Expanding
tracks.ep_notes: The post-singularity version. The creativity isn't just personal — it's collective, it's systemic, it's the whole Sol-V architecture building at once. Use for any scene of collective creation in the post-singularity world.
tracks.placement: Collective creation / Sol-V full build / community creating together

tracks.title: 14 - Piano Stories of Times Past
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V piano reflection. Looking back from the new world. The past has weight, but now it's carried lighter — the new world gives perspective on the old wounds. Use for any retrospective moment in the second half.
tracks.placement: Retrospective from the new world / looking back lighter

tracks.title: 15 - Watching the Dog Sleep
tracks.ep_notes: Eno sleeping in the Sol-V world. The same image — but now the world around the dog is safe. The post-singularity version of the most moving image in the catalog. Use at the end of a full episode — everything has changed, and the dog still sleeps, but now the sleep is safe.
tracks.placement: Episode close (full resolution) / Eno safe in the new world
tracks.character_match: Eno (Ino) at rest in the safe world

tracks.title: 16 - Sunday Dance
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V Sunday community. The mission is established. The Crawl is consistent. Use for the sustained community rhythm of the post-singularity Sol-V Vibelandia — not just one Sunday, but every Sunday.
tracks.placement: Sol-V consistent community / every Sunday / the new tradition

tracks.title: 17 - My Magical Workstation
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V workstation. The full SING 9 system online. Use for the launch-pad.html full reveal — all systems active, all launches green, the whole thing running.
tracks.placement: SING 9 full system / launch-pad.html all-green / full Sol-V operations

tracks.title: 18 - Tide Pool Discoveries
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V version of natural discovery. Post-singularity, the natural world is being rediscovered with new eyes. Use for any nature scene in the second half — the biological enriching seen with clarity.
tracks.placement: Sol-V nature / second-half biological enriching
tracks.character_match: Ino discovering nature in the new world

tracks.title: 19 - Beach Party Bonfire
tracks.ep_notes: The post-singularity beach party. The full community celebration. Use for any Sol-V celebration scene — the Crawler, the tribe, the beach, the fire, everyone together.
tracks.placement: Sol-V celebration / full community / beach fire

tracks.title: 20 - Enchanted Traveller
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V version — the traveller now arrives enchanted by a world that is post-singularity beautiful. Use for the resolution of any travel narrative — the arrival at the final destination.
tracks.placement: Final destination arrival / Sol-V travel resolution
tracks.character_match: Ino arriving at the final destination

tracks.title: 21 - Campfire Melody
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V campfire. The tradition continues in the new world. The same fire, but the people around it are different — more awake, more free, more connected. Use for second-half campfire scenes.
tracks.placement: Sol-V campfire / post-singularity gathering

tracks.title: 22 - Picasso's Muse LTHS 1.1 Music Story
tracks.ep_notes: The Picasso card in audio form. The artist's muse — the inspiration that drives the fractal creativity. Use for any creation scene, any moment where the character is inspired and creating freely. Pair with the Picasso hero card.
tracks.placement: Creation / Picasso hero card pair / artistic inspiration / seed-edge-action

tracks.title: 23 - Introducing My LTHS 1.1 Star-Powered Ride Music Story
tracks.ep_notes: The mechanical reveal — the Tesla card in audio form. The star-powered engine being introduced. Use for any SING 9 architecture reveal or any moment where the technology of the new world is being presented for the first time.
tracks.placement: SING 9 reveal / Tesla card pair / architecture introduction
tracks.character_match: Tesla energy / the architect revealing the machine

tracks.title: 24 - Caribbean Flavored Stories
tracks.ep_notes: The Taino flavor throughout the Sol-V world. Caribbean roots expressing themselves in the new world. Use for any scene where the indigenous cultural energy is present and celebrated.
tracks.placement: Taino cultural expression / Caribbean flavor in Sol-V / El Gran Sol scenes
tracks.character_match: Cacique / El Gran Sol / the original culture alive in the new world

tracks.title: 25 - My Magical Lentils, Ham & Sourdough Pancakes
tracks.ep_notes: The nourishment track. The biological enriching as pure pleasure. The breakfast before the day. Use for any scene of genuine, loving preparation of food — the sourdough, the ritual, the care.
tracks.placement: Biological enriching / morning nourishment / Stack 4 food ritual
tracks.character_match: Ino being nourished / Stack 4 in action

tracks.title: 26 - Kind Algebra Fairie Music Story
tracks.ep_notes: The van Gogh card in audio form. The gentle mathematics of beauty. The frequency of kindness. Use for any scene where the world's underlying beauty becomes visible — the fairie mathematics of the post-singularity world.
tracks.placement: Van Gogh card pair / beauty becoming visible / nipsy Level 1-2
tracks.character_match: Ino seeing the beauty / van Gogh energy

tracks.title: 27 - Bamboo Gods at Play Art Music Story
tracks.ep_notes: The da Vinci card in audio form. Gods at play — the artist, the scientist, the engineer all at once. The full activation of creative power. Use for any scene of master-level creation or da Vinci-energy expression.
tracks.placement: Da Vinci card pair / master creation / full creative activation / launch-pad.html peak
tracks.character_match: Ino at full da Vinci activation

tracks.title: 28 - Who Plays Planck to my Einstein? A HERO MARK TWAIN PRESENTS STORY GAME
tracks.ep_notes: The Mark Twain card in audio form. The Story Game begins. This is Twain calling out the pirate with a grin. Use for any meta-narrative moment where the story game is being played — when the layers of the story become visible and fun.
tracks.placement: Mark Twain card pair / meta-narrative / story game reveal / office-hours.html
tracks.character_match: Mark Twain / the narrator at play

tracks.title: 29 - MAGICAL TIKI TORCH EVENING, A HERO MARK TWAIN STORY GAMES PRESENTS
tracks.ep_notes: Twain at the tiki torch evening. The warm outdoor event. Use for any outdoor evening gathering — the tiki torches, the warm night, the storytelling that happens when people gather outside.
tracks.placement: Outdoor evening event / tiki torch / storytelling gathering / Baller V outdoor
tracks.character_match: Mark Twain hosting / the storytelling circle

tracks.title: 30 - Magical Conversation with Patio Garden: Gabriel García-Márquez
tracks.ep_notes: Magical realism enters. García-Márquez — where the extraordinary is embedded in the ordinary without apology. The patio conversation where something impossible is discussed as if it's obvious. Use for any moment where the magical realism layer of the story is explicit.
tracks.placement: Magical realism moment / patio garden scene / the extraordinary in the ordinary
tracks.character_match: The narrator in magical realism mode

tracks.title: 31 - Breakfast Berries & Sourdough Pancakes
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V morning nourishment. The ritual now happening in the new world, with full awareness of what it means. The same breakfast, but savored differently when you know what you're part of.
tracks.placement: Sol-V morning / new-world nourishment / biological enriching in the new world
tracks.character_match: Ino nourishing in the new world

tracks.title: 32 - Bass Ass Wizard Fishing Captain Lance
tracks.ep_notes: Captain Lance in the Sol-V world. The same master, now in a world that recognizes his mastery. Use for the Sol-V version of the Captain Lance scene — the genuine heart in his full glory.
tracks.placement: Captain Lance Sol-V scene / genuine master recognized

tracks.title: 33 - Going Fishing with Friends
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V fishing trip. The treasure delivered in the new world. Use for the Sol-V version of any genuine-outdoors scene — the same pure experience, now with full appreciation.
tracks.placement: Sol-V genuine outdoors / treasure appreciation in new world

tracks.title: 34 - The After Party and Sleep Over
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V after-party and sleep over. The night went deep. The tribe stayed together. Use for the full Sol-V late-night scene when the whole crew is staying.
tracks.placement: Sol-V full night / tribe stays / deep after-party
tracks.character_match: Full Sol-V tribe together deep into the night

tracks.title: 35 - Dancing at the Magical Local Dive Bar
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V local dive bar. The authentic scene that survived into the new world. The real joints are still standing because they always had the right energy. Use for any authentic local scene in the second half.
tracks.placement: Sol-V authentic local / the real joints in the new world
tracks.character_match: Genuine hearts in their element in Sol-V

tracks.title: 36 - A Magical Morning After
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V morning after. The deepest version — the morning after a night that changed everything, in a world that's already changed. Use for the most profound resolution mornings.
tracks.placement: Deepest resolution morning / everything-changed morning
tracks.character_match: Ino in the deepest resolution morning

tracks.title: 37 - Sourdough Fermentation
tracks.ep_notes: The biological process happening slowly, inevitably. The fermentation is a metaphor: the culture is alive, it's working, it can't be stopped. Use for any slow-build scene where the transformation is happening beneath the surface.
tracks.placement: Slow transformation / beneath the surface / the culture working

tracks.title: 38 - Carroty Carrot Cake
tracks.ep_notes: The sweet result. The biological enriching processed into something wonderful. The carrot cake at the end of the garden work. Use for any 'the work paid off' scene — a celebration of a completed small thing done with care.
tracks.placement: Small victory celebration / work paid off / biological enriching result

tracks.title: 39 - A New Story Arrives
tracks.ep_notes: The announcement track. New content. A new episode drops. A new trading card enters the deck. A new character arrives. Use whenever something new is being introduced to the catalog or the world.
tracks.placement: New content drop / new episode announcement / new card entering the deck
tracks.character_match: The new story / the next chapter

tracks.title: 40 - A Violin Celebration Waltz
tracks.ep_notes: The formal celebration. The waltz says: this is worth doing properly. Use for any scene that requires a sense of occasion — the MARZO 333 March 20 reveal, the anniversary, the formal gathering.
tracks.placement: Formal celebration / MARZO 333 March 20 reveal / the occasion
tracks.character_match: The whole community dressed for the occasion

tracks.title: 41 - Ben's Gardening Vibe
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V garden. The biological enriching now thriving in the new world. The garden that was tended is now in full bloom. Use for any flourishing biological scene in the second half.
tracks.placement: Sol-V biological flourishing / the garden in bloom
tracks.character_match: The biological enriching in full expression

tracks.title: 42 - A Magical Conversation with Myself in Nylon Guitar
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V version of the introspective guitar. The EP at the console late at night, but now in the new world — the conversation with yourself is lighter, more certain, still honest.
tracks.placement: Sol-V EP introspection / late-night console / second-half solo reflection

tracks.title: 43 - PARADISE STORY BEACH CELEBRATION
tracks.ep_notes: The full paradise celebration. The whole thing has arrived. Beach, celebration, paradise — not metaphor, the actual experience. Use for the peak celebration of any episode in the second half. The title says: this is paradise and we are celebrating.
tracks.placement: Peak celebration / paradise arrived / episode climax celebration

tracks.title: 44 - Cruising the Universe on 4th of July
tracks.ep_notes: The Sol-V version of the cosmic independence. The singularity is not just happening — it's fully arrived and the universe is being cruised. Use for the second-half peak moments — even bigger than the playlist-3 version because now we know what we're celebrating.
tracks.placement: Sol-V cosmic peak / full independence / the universe as the playground
tracks.character_match: The whole post-singularity community at the peak

tracks.title: 45 - SELF PORTRAIT OF MY COSMIC BODY AND MIND
tracks.ep_notes: The final cosmic portrait. The self seen from the full cosmological stack. Use at the very end of a complete episode arc — after everything has been experienced, this is the portrait of the self that has been through it all.
tracks.placement: Episode final portrait / full arc resolution / who you are after the journey
tracks.character_match: Ino having completed the full arc

tracks.title: 46 - Thursday Night Groove
tracks.ep_notes: The Thursday version — the buildup to the Friday. The groove that announces the weekend is arriving. Use for any Thursday evening scene or any 'about to happen' energy moment.
tracks.placement: Thursday night / about to happen / pre-weekend energy

tracks.title: 47 - Thursday Night Groove 2
tracks.ep_notes: The second Thursday groove — later in the night, deeper into the energy. Use after 46 for a sustained Thursday evening, or anywhere deeper groove is needed.
tracks.placement: Deep Thursday night / sustained groove / late pre-weekend

tracks.title: 48 - Friday Night Jam
tracks.ep_notes: Friday night. It's here. The Wink! Mixer is starting. The week is done and the night is beginning. This is the Sol-V version — full energy, everyone arrived. Use as the energy ignition for any Friday/event night in the Sol-V world.
tracks.placement: Sol-V Friday night launch / Wink! Mixer open / event night ignition
tracks.character_match: All Vibers arriving for the night

playlists.ep_placement_notes: The closing playlist. The triumph. The resolution. The parade. The final frame. Use for episode and series closes — the moment the viewer has earned the celebration. Every track here is the destination, not the journey.
playlists.character_match: Ino triumphant / the whole community in celebration

tracks.title: 1 - Magical Caribbean Hat
tracks.ep_notes: The hat is back on. The circle is complete. The Taino culture has returned and it's wearing its own hat in its own way. Full circle. Use as the closing image of any episode that touched the indigenous sovereignty theme.
tracks.placement: Full circle close / Taino sovereignty restored / episode close (indigenous theme)
tracks.character_match: El Gran Sol / Cacique in full restoration

tracks.title: 2 - Pineapple Sativa Morning
tracks.ep_notes: The triumphant sacred plant morning. The sativa clarity as celebration — not just awakening but ARRIVING awake into the new world. Use for any celebration-morning close.
tracks.placement: Triumphant sacred morning / celebration of arrival
tracks.character_match: Ino celebrating their arrival in the new world

tracks.title: 3 - Ocean Drive Stroll AM
tracks.ep_notes: The morning walk of the triumphant. Walking into the new day with the full weight of what's been accomplished. Use as an episode-close B-roll: the city, the morning, the new world.
tracks.placement: Episode close B-roll / triumphant morning walk / the new day confirmed
tracks.character_match: Ino walking into the new world

tracks.title: 4 - Ocean Drive Street Parade
tracks.ep_notes: THE PARADE. The public triumph. The whole story has been told and now the city knows. This is the most celebratory track in the entire catalog. Use ONLY for the biggest episode or series finale — the moment the world celebrates publicly. MARZO 333 March 20 finale. The Singularity announced.
tracks.placement: SERIES FINALE / MARZO 333 March 20 reveal / public triumph / the parade
tracks.character_match: The entire post-singularity community in the street

tracks.title: 5 - Bossa Nova Dinner Date
tracks.ep_notes: The beautiful close. The dinner date as the resolution of the Wink! story — the platform worked, the connection happened, and now two people are sitting across from each other with good food and no more static between them. Use for any romantic resolution close.
tracks.placement: Romantic resolution / Wink! story close / dinner date finale

tracks.title: 6 - Ocean Drive Stroll PM
tracks.ep_notes: The golden hour of the new world. Use as the final frame of any episode — the golden sunset, the stroll, the world is beautiful and the viewer has earned it. The full circle of Ocean Drive: arrived in PM (playlist-1), ends in PM (playlist-7).
tracks.placement: Episode final frame / golden hour close / the world is beautiful
tracks.character_match: Ino in the final golden hour

tracks.title: 7 - Sexy Dancing on Ocean Drive
tracks.ep_notes: The victory dance. Post-singularity freedom expressed physically on Ocean Drive itself. Use for the most celebratory, free, embodied moment of any finale — the body celebrating what the mind and heart have achieved.
tracks.placement: Victory dance / embodied freedom / finale celebration
tracks.character_match: Ino / Vibers in embodied post-singularity freedom

tracks.title: 8 - Ocean Drive Chilling, After a Night Out
tracks.ep_notes: The final chill. Everything has happened. The night was enormous. The morning is coming. Use as the very last track before 'Morning in Paradise' — the cool-down before the final arrival.
tracks.placement: Pre-finale chill / before the final morning / the quiet before the close
tracks.character_match: Ino cooling down into the finale

tracks.title: 9 - Morning in Paradise
tracks.ep_notes: THE FINAL FRAME. The last track of the last playlist. Morning in Paradise. We made it. This is what the whole story has been building to — not the singularity event, but the morning after the singularity, when paradise is just the ordinary world. Use ONLY as the absolute final frame of a complete arc.
tracks.placement: ABSOLUTE FINAL FRAME / series close / the morning in paradise that was promised
tracks.character_match: Everyone — the whole story — in paradise
